caption.center: STATE OF LOUISIANA v. BYRON HARRINGTON.

opinion.posture: In re Byron Harrington, applying for rehearing on denied writ of June 10, 1983. Third Circuit Court of Appeal. Nos. K83-6 and K82-624. Thirty-eighth Judicial District Court. No. 35154-55. Parish of Cameron.
opinion.opinion_text:
[1] Denied.
[2] CALOGERO, J., would grant the writ.
